Tooltip: Get custom item progress in an output string

Arguments.Name: in_ItemId
Arguments.Tooltip: ID of the item in the "Main" Table

Arguments.Name: in_Config
Arguments.Tooltip: Framework Config dictionary - Keys used: DBConnection

Arguments.Name: in_ItemDataTable
Arguments.Tooltip: Name of the SQL Table. Defaults to in_Config("ItemDataTable") If empty

Arguments.Name: out_Progress
Arguments.Tooltip: Progress string for the specified item
